name: Project M (itch) (Frost Mind)
description:
Action bullet hell roguelike in which the player does not have his own body – he controls enemies by inhabiting them

The player controls a disembodied entity, according to the setting of the game – a certain software program. To leave the room, he must destroy all combat units. This goal is achieved with the help of the mechanics of body capture. The player evaluates the battlefield, climbs into the body of interest and destroys the rest.
